article_title: Select Specialty's Heights hospital is closing
article_text:
Select Specialty's Heights hospital is closing

In a surprise move, Select Specialty Hospital, an acute care facility in the Heights, has stopped accepting patients and will close its doors this summer due to "business reasons." CEO Teresa Davis said 222 employees will be laid off.

article_metadata.description: In a surprise move, Select Specialty Hospital, an acute care facility in the Heights, has stopped accepting patients and will close its doors this summer due to "business reasons."  A May 5 letter from John Saich, executive vice president and chief human resources officer for Select Medical, gave notice to the Texas Workforce Commission that 222 non-union employees would be laid off and it was to be considered a"permanent closure."
article_metadata.author.name: By Jenny Deam
